name: Black Awareness Day
description: This photo was taken during a march that happened on Black Awareness Day's march (20/11/2019). This day remembers the history of resistance against slavery and the fight against racism in Brazil. Viva Zumbi dos Palmares! The sign says: "Black Awereness March: Against racism, genocide and the right of living!". Recife, 2019. 5184x3456 px. @visualfracto
